name: EntityHelper
description: The EntityHelper class is a fundamental wrapper for Minecraft entities in JSMacros, providing access to entity properties, behaviors, and interactions.
overview:
It serves as the base class for all entity-related helpers and offers comprehensive methods for querying entity information, positions, states, and performing various operations on entities.

This class is typically obtained through events, world queries, or as return values from other helper methods. EntityHelper instances represent specific entity objects in the game world, containing their current state and position.

**Notes and Limitations:**
- EntityHelper instances become invalid when the entity is removed from the world. Always check `isAlive()` before accessing entity data.
- The `as*()` casting methods can throw `ClassCastException` if the entity is not of the expected type. Use `is()` to check types first.
- Position methods return different coordinate systems - `getPos()` returns world coordinates while `getBlockPos()` returns block coordinates.
- Raytracing methods may return null if no entity or block is found within the specified distance.
- Distance calculations use different precision levels - `float` for entity-to-entity, `double` for position-based calculations.

methods.name: getPos
methods.description: Retrieves the entity's position in the world. Part of the Position and Movement category.

methods.name: getBlockPos
methods.description: Retrieves the block coordinates of the entity. Part of the Position and Movement category.

methods.name: getEyePos
methods.description: Retrieves the position of the entity's eyes. Part of the Position and Movement category.

methods.name: getChunkPos
methods.description: Retrieves the chunk coordinates the entity is currently in. Part of the Position and Movement category.

methods.name: getX
methods.description: Retrieves the X coordinate. Part of the Position and Movement category.

methods.name: getY
methods.description: Retrieves the Y coordinate. Part of the Position and Movement category.

methods.name: getZ
methods.description: Retrieves the Z coordinate. Part of the Position and Movement category.

methods.name: getEyeHeight
methods.description: Retrieves the height of the entity's eyes from its feet. Part of the Position and Movement category.

methods.name: getVelocity
methods.description: Retrieves the current velocity vector of the entity. Part of the Position and Movement category.

methods.name: getSpeed
methods.description: Retrieves the movement speed of the entity. Part of the Position and Movement category.

methods.name: getFacingDirection
methods.description: Retrieves the direction the entity is facing. Part of the Position and Movement category.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Retrieves the name of the entity as a text component. Part of the Entity Information category.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Retrieves the resource identifier string for the entity type (e.g., 'minecraft:zombie'). Part of the Entity Information category.

methods.name: is
methods.description: Checks if the entity ID matches one of the provided types. Added in version 1.9.0. Part of the Entity Information category.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: One or more entity identifiers to check against.

methods.name: getUUID
methods.description: Retrieves the unique identifier (UUID) of the entity. Part of the Entity Information category.

methods.name: getBiome
methods.description: Retrieves the biome the entity is currently in. Part of the Entity Information category.

methods.name: getChunk
methods.description: Retrieves the chunk object the entity is currently in. Part of the Entity Information category.

methods.name: getNBT
methods.description: Retrieves the NBT data of the entity. Note: Access is read-only for some types. Part of the Entity Information category.

methods.name: isAlive
methods.description: Checks if the entity is currently alive and valid in the world. Part of the State and Conditions category.

methods.name: isGlowing
methods.description: Checks if the entity has the glowing effect. Part of the State and Conditions category.

methods.name: isInLava
methods.description: Checks if the entity is in lava. Part of the State and Conditions category.

methods.name: isOnFire
methods.description: Checks if the entity is currently burning. Part of the State and Conditions category.

methods.name: isSneaking
methods.description: Checks if the entity is sneaking/crouching. Part of the State and Conditions category.

methods.name: isSprinting
methods.description: Checks if the entity is sprinting. Part of the State and Conditions category.

methods.name: getAir
methods.description: Retrieves the current air/breath level of the entity. Part of the State and Conditions category.

methods.name: getMaxAir
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum air capacity of the entity. Part of the State and Conditions category.

methods.name: setCustomName
methods.description: Sets a custom name for the entity. Part of the Appearance and Effects category.

methods.name: setCustomNameVisible
methods.description: Sets whether the custom name is visible. Part of the Appearance and Effects category.

methods.name: setGlowing
methods.description: Enables or disables the glowing effect on the entity. Part of the Appearance and Effects category.

parameters.name: glowing
parameters.description: True to enable glowing, false to disable.

methods.name: setGlowingColor
methods.description: Sets the color of the glowing effect. Part of the Appearance and Effects category.

methods.name: getGlowingColor
methods.description: Retrieves the current glowing color. Part of the Appearance and Effects category.

methods.name: resetGlowing
methods.description: Resets the glowing status to default. Part of the Appearance and Effects category.

methods.name: resetGlowingColor
methods.description: Resets the glowing color to default. Part of the Appearance and Effects category.

methods.name: getVehicle
methods.description: Retrieves the vehicle this entity is riding, if any. Part of the Relationships and Passengers category.

methods.name: getPassengers
methods.description: Retrieves a list of entities riding this entity. Part of the Relationships and Passengers category.

methods.name: rayTraceBlock
methods.description: Performs a raytrace for blocks in the entity's looking direction. Part of the Interaction and Raytracing category.

methods.name: rayTraceEntity
methods.description: Performs a raytrace for other entities in the entity's looking direction. Part of the Interaction and Raytracing category.

methods.name: distanceTo
methods.description: Calculates the distance to another entity. Part of the Distance and Comparison category.

methods.name: asClientPlayer
methods.description: Casts this entity to a ClientPlayerEntityHelper. Throws exception if invalid. Part of the Type Casting category.

methods.name: asPlayer
methods.description: Casts this entity to a PlayerEntityHelper. Throws exception if invalid. Part of the Type Casting category.

methods.name: asVillager
methods.description: Casts this entity to a VillagerEntityHelper. Throws exception if invalid. Part of the Type Casting category.

methods.name: asMerchant
methods.description: Casts this entity to a MerchantEntityHelper. Throws exception if invalid. Part of the Type Casting category.

methods.name: asLiving
methods.description: Casts this entity to a LivingEntityHelper. Throws exception if invalid. Part of the Type Casting category.

methods.name: asAnimal
methods.description: Casts this entity to an AnimalEntityHelper. Throws exception if invalid. Part of the Type Casting category.

methods.name: asItem
methods.description: Casts this entity to an ItemEntityHelper. Throws exception if invalid. Part of the Type Casting category.

methods.name: asServerEntity
methods.description: Casts this entity to a ServerEntityHelper. Throws exception if invalid. Part of the Type Casting category.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the entity. Part of the Utility Methods category.
